Sentencas: This study analyzed the internal phenomena of solid oxide fuel cells driven by liquefied natural gas.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: Reforming reactions of liquefied natural gas constituent in the solid oxide fuel cells were examined.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: First, the performance of solid oxide fuel cells using liquefied natural gas was compared to those using methane as fuel.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: Liquefied natural gas-driven solid oxide fuel cells outperformed methane-driven solid oxide fuel cells under all current conditions, with a maximum performance difference of approximately 12.8%.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: Then, the effect of inlet composition ratio on the internal phenomena in the solid oxide fuel cells was examined.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: The lower the steam-to-carbon ratio, the higher the steam reforming reaction in the cell.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: By changing the ratio, 7.1% of more hydrogen could be reformed.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: Finally, the effect of reformer operation on the internal phenomena in the solid oxide fuel cells was examined.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: Under 0.35 A cm(-2), lower pre-reforming rate of reformer enhance the performance of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: At high current density region, however, a higher pre-reforming rate of reforming is more favorable because the reforming reaction is rare in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel

Sentencas: This research can provide guidelines for achieving high power output of solid oxide fuel cells with high fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Study on Internal Phenomena of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Liquefied Natural Gas as Fuel
